## Problem 1

Importing Dataset

```{r}
trash_df=
  read_xlsx(
    "./data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx",
  sheet="Mr. Trash Wheel",
  range=cell_cols("A:N"))

    trash_df2= 
      janitor::clean_names (trash_df) %>% 
     drop_na(dumpster) %>% 
    mutate(
      sports_balls= round(sports_balls),
      sports_balls= as.integer(sports_balls)
    )
  
```


```{r}
print(trash_df2)
```
